verses.verse: וְזֶ֨ה <WH2088> now this הַדָּבָ֜ר <WH1697> And this [is] the thing אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> you תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> that thou shalt do לָהֶ֛ם לְקַדֵּ֥שׁ <WH6942> unto them to hallow אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לְכַהֵ֣ן <WH3547> them to minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י לְ֠קַח <WH3947> Take פַּ֣ר <WH6499> bullock אֶחָ֧ד <WH259> one בֶּן־ <WH1121> young בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> bull וְאֵילִ֥ם <WH352> rams שְׁנַ֖יִם <WH8147> and two תְּמִימִֽם׃ <WH8549> without blemish

וְלֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> bread מַצּ֗וֹת <WH4682> And unleavened וְחַלֹּ֤ת <WH2471> and cakes מַצֹּת֙ <WH4682> unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <WH1101> tempered בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <WH7550> and wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <WH4886> anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> with oil סֹ֥לֶת <WH5560> flour חִטִּ֖ים <WH2406> [of] wheaten תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְנָתַתָּ֤ <WH5414> And thou shalt put אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> and סַ֣ל <WH5536> basket אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> them into one וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֥ <WH7126> and bring אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בַּסָּ֑ל <WH5536> them in the basket וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH854> with הַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> with the bullock וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> and the two הָאֵילִֽם׃ <WH352> rams

וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> And Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָיו֙ <WH1121> and his sons תַּקְרִ֔יב <WH7126> thou shalt bring אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְרָחַצְתָּ֥ <WH7364> and shalt wash אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> them with water

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> And thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּגָדִ֗ים <WH899> the garments וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֤ <WH3847> and put אֶֽת־ <WH853> אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> upon Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֻּתֹּ֔נֶת <WH3801> the coat וְאֵת֙ <WH853> מְעִ֣יל <WH4598> and the robe הָאֵפֹ֔ד <WH646> of the ephod וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> and the ephod וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <WH2833> and the breastplate וְאָפַדְתָּ֣ <WH640> and gird ל֔וֹ בְּחֵ֖שֶׁב <WH2805> him with the curious girdle הָאֵפֹֽד׃ <WH646> of the ephod

וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <WH7760> And thou shalt put הַמִּצְנֶ֖פֶת <WH4701> the mitre עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> upon his head וְנָתַתָּ֛ <WH5414> and put אֶת־ <WH853> נֵ֥זֶר <WH5145> crown הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּצְנָֽפֶת׃ <WH4701> upon the mitre

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> Then shalt thou take אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> the anointing וְיָצַקְתָּ֖ <WH3332> and pour עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> [it] upon his head וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֖ <WH4886> and anoint אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>
וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> his sons תַּקְרִ֑יב <WH7126> And thou shalt bring וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֖ם <WH3847> and put כֻּתֳּנֹֽת׃ <WH3801> coats

וְחָגַרְתָּ֩ <WH2296> And thou shalt gird אֹתָ֨ם <WH853> אַבְנֵ֜ט <WH73> them with girdles אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> Aaron וּבָנָ֗יו <WH1121> and his sons וְחָבַשְׁתָּ֤ <WH2280> and put לָהֶם֙ <WH1992> like מִגְבָּעֹ֔ת <WH4021> the bonnets וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> shall have לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> like כְּהֻנָּ֖ה <WH3550> on them and the priest's office לְחֻקַּ֣ת <WH2708> statute עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> shall be theirs for a perpetual וּמִלֵּאתָ֥ <WH4390> accomplish יַֽד־ <WH3027> able אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> Aaron וְיַד־ <WH3027> able בָּנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> and his sons

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֙ <WH7126> to be brought אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> And thou shalt cause a bullock לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְסָמַ֨ךְ <WH5564> shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הַפָּֽר׃ <WH6499> of the bullock

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֥ <WH7819> And thou shalt kill אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֖ר <WH6499> the bullock לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> [by] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> And thou shalt take מִדַּ֣ם <WH1818> of the blood הַפָּ֔ר <WH6499> of the bullock וְנָתַתָּ֛ה <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on קַרְנֹ֥ת <WH7161> [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> of the altar בְּאֶצְבָּעֶ֑ךָ <WH676> with thy finger וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדָּ֣ם <WH1818> all the blood תִּשְׁפֹּ֔ךְ <WH8210> and pour אֶל־ <WH413> beside יְס֖וֹד <WH3247> the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> of the altar

וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֗ <WH3947> And thou shalt take אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַחֵלֶב֮ <WH2459> all the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֶּרֶב֒ <WH7130> the inwards וְאֵ֗ת <WH853> הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3508> and the caul עַל־ <WH5921> of הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> [that is] above the liver וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> and the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> that עֲלֵיהֶ֑ן <WH5921> is on וְהִקְטַרְתָּ֖ <WH6999> that [is] upon them and burn הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <WH4196> [them] upon the altar

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּשַׂ֤ר <WH1320> But the flesh הַפָּר֙ <WH6499> of the bullock וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֹר֣וֹ <WH5785> and his skin וְאֶת־ <WH853> פִּרְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6569> and his dung תִּשְׂרֹ֣ף <WH8313> shalt thou burn בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> with fire מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> the camp חַטָּ֖את <WH2403> it [is] a sin offering הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַ֥יִל <WH352> ram הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one תִּקָּ֑ח <WH3947> Thou shalt also take וְסָ֨מְכ֜וּ <WH5564> shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <WH352> of the ram

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֖ <WH7819> And thou shalt slay אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑יִל <WH352> the ram וְלָֽקַחְתָּ֙ <WH3947> and thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמ֔וֹ <WH1818> his blood וְזָרַקְתָּ֥ <WH2236> and sprinkle עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> [it] round about

וְאֶ֨ת־ <WH853> הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> the ram תְּנַתֵּ֖חַ <WH5408> And thou shalt cut לִנְתָחָ֑יו <WH5409> in pieces וְרָחַצְתָּ֤ <WH7364> and wash קִרְבּוֹ֙ <WH7130> the inwards וּכְרָעָ֔יו <WH3767> of him and his legs וְנָתַתָּ֥ <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> and נְתָחָ֖יו <WH5409> [them] unto his pieces וְעַל־ <WH5921> and its רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> and unto his head

וְהִקְטַרְתָּ֤ <WH6999> And thou shalt burn אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאַ֙יִל֙ <WH352> the whole ram הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> upon the altar עֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> it [is] a burnt offering ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיח֔וֹחַ <WH5207> it [is] a sweet אִשֶּׁ֥ה <WH801> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> you

וְלָ֣קַחְתָּ֔ <WH3947> And thou shalt take אֵ֖ת <WH853> הָאַ֣יִל <WH352> ram הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <WH8145> the other וְסָמַ֨ךְ <WH5564> shall put אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <WH352> of the ram

וְשָׁחַטְתָּ֣ <WH7819> Then shalt thou kill אֶת־ <WH853> הָאַ֗יִל <WH352> the ram וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <WH3947> and take מִדָּמוֹ֙ <WH1818> of his blood וְנָֽתַתָּ֡ה <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on תְּנוּךְ֩ <WH8571> [it] upon the tip אֹ֨זֶן <WH241> of the right ear אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> of Aaron וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on תְּנ֨וּךְ <WH8571> and upon the tip אֹ֤זֶן <WH241> ear בָּנָיו֙ <WH1121> of his sons הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> of the right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֤הֶן <WH931> and upon the thumb יָדָם֙ <WH3027> hand הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> of their right וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בֹּ֥הֶן <WH931> and upon the great toe רַגְלָ֖ם <WH7272> foot הַיְמָנִ֑ית <WH3233> of their right וְזָרַקְתָּ֧ <WH2236> and sprinkle אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֛ם <WH1818> the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְלָקַחְתָּ֞ <WH3947> And thou shalt take מִן־ <WH4480> some הַדָּ֨ם <WH1818> of the blood אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that עַֽל־ <WH5921> is on הַמִּזְבֵּחַ֮ <WH4196> that [is] upon the altar וּמִשֶּׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָה֒ <WH4888> and of the anointing וְהִזֵּיתָ֤ <WH5137> and sprinkle עַֽל־ <WH5921> on אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> [it] upon Aaron וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בְּגָדָ֔יו <WH899> and upon his garments וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on בָּנָ֛יו <WH1121> and upon his sons וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בִּגְדֵ֥י <WH899> and upon the garments בָנָ֖יו <WH1121> of his sons אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for וְקָדַ֥שׁ <WH6942> with him and he shall be hallowed הוּא֙ <WH1931> he וּבְגָדָ֔יו <WH899> and his garments וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> and his sons וּבִגְדֵ֥י <WH899> garments בָנָ֖יו <WH1121> and his sons' אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> Also thou shalt take מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֠אַיִל <WH352> of the ram הַחֵ֨לֶב <WH2459> the fat וְהָֽאַלְיָ֜ה <WH451> and the rump וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֣לֶב ׀ <WH2459> and the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֶּ֗רֶב <WH7130> the inwards וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> יֹתֶ֤רֶת <WH3508> and the caul הַכָּבֵד֙ <WH3516> [above] the liver וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> and the two הַכְּלָיֹ֗ת <WH3629> kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after עֲלֵהֶ֔ן <WH5921> and וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַיָּמִ֑ין <WH3225> that [is] upon them and the right כִּ֛י <WH3588> is a אֵ֥יל <WH352> for it [is] a ram מִלֻּאִ֖ים <WH4394> of consecration הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְכִכַּ֨ר <WH3603> loaf לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> of bread אַחַ֗ת <WH259> And one וַֽחַלַּ֨ת <WH2471> cake לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> of bread שֶׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> of oiled אַחַ֖ת <WH259> and one וְרָקִ֣יק <WH7550> wafer אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> bread and one מִסַּל֙ <WH5536> out of the basket הַמַּצּ֔וֹת <WH4682> of the unleavened bread אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [is] before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <WH7760> And thou shalt put הַכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> all עַ֚ל <WH5921> in כַּפֵּ֣י <WH3709> all in the hands אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> of Aaron וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and in כַּפֵּ֣י <WH3709> and in the hands בָנָ֑יו <WH1121> of his sons וְהֵנַפְתָּ֥ <WH5130> and shalt wave אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> them [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְלָקַחְתָּ֤ <WH3947> And thou shalt receive אֹתָם֙ <WH853> מִיָּדָ֔ם <WH3027> them of their hands וְהִקְטַרְתָּ֥ <WH6999> and burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חָה <WH4196> [them] upon the altar עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> for a burnt offering לְרֵ֤יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיח֙וֹחַ֙ <WH5207> for a sweet לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אִשֶּׁ֥ה <WH801> it [is] an offering made by fire ה֖וּא <WH1931> he לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> And thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> הֶֽחָזֶ֗ה <WH2373> the breast מֵאֵ֤יל <WH352> of the ram הַמִּלֻּאִים֙ <WH4394> consecration אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> his לְאַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> of Aaron's וְהֵנַפְתָּ֥ <WH5130> and wave אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> it [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֖ לְמָנָֽה׃ <WH4490> and it shall be thy part

וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֞ <WH6942> And thou shalt sanctify אֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> חֲזֵ֣ה <WH2373> the breast הַתְּנוּפָ֗ה <WH8573> of the wave offering וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> and the shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֔ה <WH8641> of the heave offering אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> [even] of [that] which הוּנַ֖ף <WH5130> which is waved וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and which הוּרָ֑ם <WH7311> and which is heaved up מֵאֵיל֙ <WH352> of the ram הַמִּלֻּאִ֔ים <WH4394> of the consecration מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> [is] for Aaron וּמֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לְבָנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> and of [that] which is for his sons
